name: Angela's love
description:
The girl in the anime suddenly has magic, accidentally know there is a different space. But they can't wear clothes inside. To satisfy their curiosity, they come to the different space. A war is about to begin.

1:5 different naked girls.
2:3 skills that increase attack.
3: Intense combat battlefield immersive.
4: Beautiful and passionate music accompanies the whole game.
5: There are 44 levels waiting to be challenged.
6: There are 44 achievements waiting to be unlocked.

Gameplay: Enter the Start interface, click the Start button and select the level. After entering the game, click the mouse below the role avatar to call the role. A total of five characters can be summoned. There are three skills you can use in the lower right. Skills and characters need to wait a certain amount of time after each summoning before they can be summoned again. Gold is required for each call. You get gold for every monster you kill. Each time the game starts, there are 100 initial coins.
